snippet: Manager Joe Girardi benched Alex Rodriguez and sat out Nick Swisher, replacing them with Eric Chavez and Brett Gardner, in a lineup shuffle that had the look of desperation and could have long-term ramifications.
abstract: Manager Joe Girardi benched Alex Rodriguez and sat out Nick Swisher, replacing them with Eric Chavez and Brett Gardner, in a lineup shuffle that had the look of desperation and could have long-term ramifications.

headline.main: Yankees Shake Things Up, but Don't Call It Panic
